quotes: This manoeuvre worked satisfactorily until last year, when it finally became obvious that no amount of United States persuasion or threat could continue to stop the growing trend towards the restoration of the lawful rights of the People’s Republic of China.
In the same year that China was admitted into the UN (1971), the former chairman of the Palestinian Liberation Organization (PLO), Yasser Arafat, was invited to address the UNGA.

organizations.name: United States
quotes: no amount of United States persuasion or threat could continue to stop the growing trend towards the restoration of the lawful rights of the People’s Republic of China.

Given the current contacts between Peking and Washington and the projected visit of President Nixon to China, the world had every reason to expect that the position of the United States on the question of Chinese representation would reflect the more realistic approach that the Administration seemed to be embarking on.
all that has changed in so far as the United States’ position on this question of representation is concerned is tactics.
